text: The Tropical Smoothie Cafe (better known as Tropical Smoothie) is an American restaurant group. Along with smoothies, these places sells sandwiches, wraps (foods) and flat breads. The Tropical Smoothie Cafe has almost 1,200 restaurants across the United States. It began as a smoothie shop in 1993 or 1994 in Destin, Florida. In 1997, the restaurants began franchising. In 1998, the company began expanding. ==References== Category:American restaurants Category:1990s establishments in Florida
title: Tropical Smoothie Cafe
